resources.string: This screen will contain name and image of recent albums or songs. \n\nPicaso library will use for display images.
This screen will show list of songs in selected album.
This screen will show player by which user can play pause skip forward or backward in current playing song.

The In-App Purchasing (IAP) 
API 
Allows your app to present, process, and fulfill purchases of digital content and subscriptions within your app. 
Amazon supports an IAP API for Android Apps and Web Apps.
